content: mini alien by barbara prime s fuzzy mitten knitting patterns © 2006-2022 knit some friendly mini aliens with this quick pattern there are instructions to knit them both flat and in the round but both look pretty much the same i made them with sport weight yarn on 3 mm needles and they turned out about 4 cm 1 5 tall these knit up really fast so you could make a pocketful in just one evening materials 5 g of sport weight or dk yarn set of four 3 mm us size 2 5 double pointed needles dpns or a pair of straight needles pair of 8 mm safety eyes or buttons stuffing yarn to embroider face tapestry needle knit in the round co 20 sts with a dpn divide sts between 3 dpns beginning of round is centre back round 1 join in the round knit round 2 k1 m1 k2 k2tog ssk k2 m1 k1 x 2 round 3 knit round 4-5 repeat rnds 2-3 round 6 k2 m1 k6 m1 k2 x 2 24 sts round 7 knit round 8 k7 mb k8 mb k7 round 9-11 knit 3 rounds round 12 k2 k2tog x 6 18 sts round 13 knit round 14 k1 k2tog x 6 12 sts round 15 knit round 16 k2tog x 6 6 sts cut yarn thread end through remaining sts and pull tight to gather thread this yarn end to the wrong side turn the toy inside out and secure this yarn end now follow the finishing instructions given below knit flat co 22 sts with a straight needle row 1 purl row 2 k1 k1 m1 k2 k2tog ssk k2 m1 k1 x 2 k1 row 3 purl row 4-5 repeat row 2-3 row 6 k1 k2 m1 k6 m1 k2 x 2 k1 26 sts row 7 purl row 8 k8 mb k8 mb k8 row 9-11 work 3 row in st st row 12 k1 k2 k2tog x 6 k1 20 sts row 13 purl row 14 k1 k1 k2tog x 6 k1 14 sts row 15 purl row 16 k1 k2tog x 6 k1 8 sts cut yarn thread end through remaining sts and pull tight to gather use this yarn end to sew the centre-back seam to the cast-on edge now follow the finishing instructions below finishing making antennae with toy inside out thread a 10 cm 4 length of yarn under a couple of stitches on the top of the head and knot securely in the middle then thread the yarn ends to the right side turn the alien right side out adjust position of antennae if necessary then knot yarn at 2 5 cm 1 above head and trim excess yarn attach the safety eyes or buttons just above and to the front side of the bobble arms stuff
